page.title: 20POPULATION
page.content: In Eastnor there are 19 children and 19 O.A.P.s, and 39 adults. The 19 O.A.P.s ,live at :The Castle Lodge,Old Shop ,1 and 2 School cottages, Winter Combe, Gables,Morley Cottage, Millstone Cottage,1 and 2 Ledbury Road.The children live at 3 Triangle, 3 School Cottage,Eastnor Court, Parsons Orchard, 1 Upper Road, Woodside, Somers Arms, and Cross Hands. The adults live at Post Office, 3 Triangle , Old Shop , 3 School Cottage,Eastnor Court, Parsons Orchard, 1 and 2 Upper Road, Millstone Cottage, Woodside, Somers Arms, 3 and 4 Ledbury Road, White House Farm and Cottage, Cross Hands and Hill Farm.The total of O.A.P.s Adults and children is 77.Most of population of Eastnor stay in the village for many years as many of the people work in or near the village.
